description: Who wants to drink the same, boring cup of coffee from the corner gas station, when you can see unique coffee places that are within a few miles of your current location? Coffee Guy is a simple app that does a search for nearby coffee places so that you can get that cup of joe the way you want it - tasting great. Simply launch the app and tap the green button to find nearby locations, or do a manual search to find cafe's within a zip-code or city that you'll be visiting. Coffee Guy gives you a list of places to check out no matter where you are. This release of Coffee Guy comes with the basic features you would expect when needing to find that local coffee place, but also includes a public chat room for talking about your favorite coffee topics. Be watching for features that will let you save your favorite drinks, baristas & cafes for easy reference, keep up to date on the latest coffee news, and let Coffee Guy pick a random drink for you (when you can't decide yourself). Coffee Guy was built with both admitted caffeine addicts and casual coffee drinkers in mind. You never know when you're local spot will be out of reach, so grab the app today and keep it handy!
